question: Which company has partnered with National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) to offer free Digital skill training?
explanation:
Leading multi-national company IBM India, has collaborated with National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) to offer a free digital education platform.
The training focuses on recent technologies like cybersecurity, blockchain, artificial intelligence and machine learning and professional development skills. The online courses developed by IBM will be offered through NSDC's eSkill India portal to the learners between 18 to 22 years.
